posts.post_content:
Posted By: Scott Levy
Trying to raise some cash quickly for a few major purchases - so prices have been reduced.  Thanks!

T206
The Becketts:
BVG 1 Chance Red Portrait (Sovereign back) - SOLD
BVG 2 Bill Hart (looks EX but tiny spot of paper loss on back) - $90
BVG 4.5 Knight Batting $55
BVG 4.5 Egan (Sovereign) $60
BVG 5.5 Chase Black Cap $180
BVG 6 Collins Minneapolis $310

PSA/SGC Graded Cards:
T206 Joe Dunn Brooklyn - PSA 4 - $48
T206 Huggins Hands at Mouth - SGC 50 - $175
T206 Zimmermann (looks EX/MT to me)- SGC 50 - $60
T206 Donlin w/ bat - SGC 60 - $90
T206 Rhoades Hands at Chest - SGC 60 - $105

T205 Downey - PSA 4 - $50
T205 Austin - Cycle back - PSA 4 - $65

Rare Backs 
T206 H. Davis P42 Poor (raw) - $100
T206 Jennings P42 - PSA 4 - SOLD
T206 Willis Throwing Cycle 460 PSA 4 - SOLD

T207 blank backs (all cards are raw):
Fletcher NY (NL) - Good - $190
Delahanty Detroit (AL) - VG - $260
Dooin Philadephia (NL) - VG - $290
McGraw NY (NL) - Good+ - $390

Beckett says these are trimmed and for the most part I agree
Beckley (looks EX+ but somewhat short) - SOLD
Chance Red Portrait (looks EX, very slightly short) - SOLD
M. Brown Portrait (looks EX, somewhat short) - SOLD
Mathewson Dark Cap (looks NR/MT, very slightly short) - SOLD
Bender Trees (looks EX/MT, appears full size) - SOLD
Bender No Trees (looks EX+ but is slightly short and slantcut) - SOLD


The Errors:
We are considering selling some of our T206 error cards including:
- Misprints
- Ghosts
- Double Names
- Blank Backs
- Missing Color (red, etc)
- Yellow Brown Scrap
- Double Cap or Uniform Insignia
- Multiple Backs
with hundreds of cards it is too much to list individually, so shoot me a line if you need to know more.

Other Raw Cards
Jones (Detroit) - VG/EX - $28
Jones Throwing (St. Louis) - VG/EX - $28
Mitchell - VG/EX - $28
Seymour Throwing EX but has wavy edge (trimmed or factory cut?) - $30

Thanks,
Scott

First Email to say "I'll take it" gets the card(s)
Orders under $100 please add $5 for shipping all other shipping is free
